entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 10:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 4.

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
